name: Paint Yr Dream
description:
~The Story~

You are in your dreams. You are an artist, an auteur, if you will. And you are a cat-looking lifeform.

You enjoy painting your dreams. If gives you a sort of dream-dopamine. It gives you the strength you need in your reality to paint the canvas, to brush the backdrop, into what you most desire from your mind. It's wonderful.

However, within your dreams lay active, horrible, nightmares, be they fictitious, or repressed memories. They will stop you in your tracks. They will hurt you. You must dodge them if you want the dream-dopamine, the strength you need.

~Controls~

Arrow-Keys: moving in four directions.

Space: Paint the canvas of your dream / interact with menu.

Escape Key: Leave the game.
